body.p: For troubleshooting, refer to the help portal link: https://obsproject.com/help
For Frequently asked Questions (FAQs), details on advanced settings and other features available in the OBS Studio, refer to the knowledge base link: https://obsproject.com/kb
For authentication with a 3CLogic server, reach out the IT help desk at abc@3clogic.comThe email id is a placeholder..
